First Start

Starting the application

To start the CuteFlow appliaction point your browser to the URL where you have installed your CuteFlow System (i.e. http://servername/cuteflow).
To access the management interface you need a user id and password. The standard installation of CuteFlow has only one user: The user admin.

Use the following data to log in:

User ID: admin
Password: admin


In the next step you should setup some user. >> User Management
